Description.Text: Inger is a contemporary 3-star hotel offering cosy accommodation and great service close to the heart of Narva. Highlights include two restaurants, a bar and a chic beauty salon. Situated close to the centre of Narva, the hotel is a great base from which to explore all that the city has to offer. Narva is situated in the east of Estonia, besides the Narva River and the Russian border. Nearby places of interest include the 15th-century Hermann Castle, Narva Art Gallery and Narva Kreenholm Stadium. There are also plenty of high quality restaurants and bars in which to dine. Narva Train Station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular destinations in east Estonia. The hotel occupies a contemporary mid-rise building with a sleek grey reflective facade. Facilities include a beauty salon which offers a great range of pampering treatments. Massages are available upon request. There is also a Finnish sauna, steam sauna and a Jacuzzi. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Salvadore restaurant offers European cuisine. Alternatively, the VIS-A-VIS restaurant, which boasts a stylish decor showcasing classic Salvador Dali artwork, offers classic Estonian cuisine. Refreshing drinks can be enjoyed in the lobby bar. Standard rooms are 14-19sqm and have a basic modern decor. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite/cable TV. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. Free parking is possible onsite.
